name: Sheriff Jimmy Green
description:
Play as the fearless Sheriff Jimmy Green facing off against bandit tumbleweeds in fast paced shootout. But here's the twist - whenever Jimmy gets hit you'll have to hold down a different key on the keyboard to stop his precious water from leaking out! 

Get your hands rooted to the keyboard as you try to get the highscore on the online leaderboard in this silly western shooter!

Made as part of Global Game Jam 2023.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Shoot - Left Mouse

Plug bullet holes - Many different keys
